mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Colville, George F.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Ithaca, Darke Co., O. [Ithaca, Darke Co., Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Colville, George F. Patient Age: 19. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Typhoid fever followed by anasarca. Treatment: Rx Last Potassium Aqua Fervant Drunk one part daily Rx Act. Potassium Act. Serlla Apts. Nit. Dulc. S Gen one tablespoonful every 4 hours. Result: Returned to duty.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Colville, George F.
Typhoid fever followed by anasarca
Private
K
34 O Vol [34th Ohio Volunteer Infantry]
Ohio
Hospital Number 3526
